data.trans_hint: Chúng ta cần phải cắt giảm lượng đường và béo.
data.en_hint: We should cut down on sugar and fat.
data.content_game_1: We should cut down on sugar and fat.
data.answer_en_hint: We should cut down on sugar and fat.

data.trans: Đối diện với, chấp nhận với
data.trans_hint: Anh phải đối mặt với sự thật rằng anh sẽ không bao giờ bước đi được nữa.
data.en_hint: He had to face up to the fact that he would never walk again.
data.content_game_1: He had to face up to the fact that he would never walk again.
data.answer_en_hint: He had to face up to the fact that he would never walk again.

data.trans: Suy giảm (về số lượng hoặc chất lượng)
data.trans_hint: Tôi ăn kiêng và sau một thời gian, cân nặng bắt đầu giảm.
data.en_hint: I went on a diet and after a while, the weight started to fall off.
data.content_game_1: I went on a diet and after a while, the weight started to fall off.
data.answer_en_hint: I went on a diet and after a while, the weight started to fall off.

data.content: as far as something is concerned
data.trans: Liên quan đến vấn đề gì
data.trans_hint: Liên quan đến vấn đề sức khỏe của bản thân, tôi cần phải từ bỏ thói quen thức khuya.
data.en_hint: As far as my health is concerned, I need to break the habit of staying up late.
data.content_game_1: as far as my health is concerned, I need to break the habit of staying up late.
data.answer_en_hint: as far as my health is concerned, I need to break the habit of staying up late.

data.trans_hint: Cậu nên ngừng ăn tinh bột nếu muốn giảm cân.
data.en_hint: You'd better cut out starch if you want to lose weight.
data.content_game_1: You'd better cut out starch if you want to lose weight.
data.answer_en_hint: You'd better cut out starch if you want to lose weight.

data.trans_hint: Một bữa sáng đầy đặn luôn khiến tôi no căng để sẵn sàng làm việc.
data.en_hint: A hearty breakfast always fills me up to get ready for work.
data.content_game_1: A hearty breakfast always fills me up to get ready for work.
data.answer_en_hint: A hearty breakfast always fills me up to get ready for work.

data.trans: Tuân thủ đúng (chế độ dinh dưỡng, chế độ luyện tập)
data.trans_hint: Bác sĩ cá nhân khuyên tôi nên tuân thủ đúng chế độ ăn uống nghiêm ngặt để tăng thêm cân.
data.en_hint: My personal doctor advised me to keep to the diet strictly to gain more weight.
data.content_game_1: My personal doctor advised me to keep to the diet strictly to gain more weight.
data.answer_en_hint: My personal doctor advised me to keep to the diet strictly to gain more weight.

data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ tăng cân nhanh nếu tôi ăn bữa khuya hằng ngày.
data.en_hint: I will put on weight quickly if I have a supper on a regular basis.
data.content_game_1: I will put on weight quickly if I have a supper on a regular basis.
data.answer_en_hint: I will put on weight quickly if I have a supper on a regular basis.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi đăng ký một khóa học Yoga để cải thiện sức khỏe.
data.en_hint: My mother signed up for a Yoga course to improve her health.
data.content_game_1: My mother signed up for a Yoga course to improve her health.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother signed up for a Yoga course to improve her health.

data.trans_hint: Khi nhận thấy sức khỏe có phần sa sút hơn, tôi biết mình cần phải thay đổi lối sống.
data.en_hint: When noticing my poorer health, I knew that I had to turn over a new leaf.
data.content_game_1: When noticing my poorer health, I knew that I had to turn over a new leaf.
data.answer_en_hint: When noticing my poorer health, I knew that I had to turn over a new leaf.
